item.title: Beogram 4002 Type 5513: Houston Beogram #3 Ready for Action Again
item.description:
My favorite stage of the Beogram 4002 restoration is here. The only remaining tasks are some enjoyable record-playing tests in my office. I find listening to records through a favorite system while working far more pleasurable than watching television…and it’s a necessary job that someone has to do. I’m truly happy with how this Beogram turned out. Knowing this turntable has been meticulously serviced is a great feeling. It’s spotless inside, and Beolover did an exceptional job revitalizing the platter motor...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-type-5513-houston-beogram-3-ready-for-action-again/

item.title: A Pair of Beomaster 1900 Receivers for Restoration: Unit #2 Wrap Up
item.description:
The second Beomaster 1900 restoration project is finished. After a night of playing music, the Beomaster 1900 was ready for the cabinet to be put back together. The Bass, Treble, and Balance indicator masks were reattached to their slide controls. The touch control panel was then placed onto the cabinet frame, carefully aligning the button actuators with the sensor posts. All touch buttons were tested to ensure functionality before continuing the reassembly...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/a-pair-of-beomaster-1900-receivers-for-restoration-unit-2-wrap-up/
